方法详细信息

createEvaluater

public static SpeechEvaluater createEvaluater(Context context,
                                              InitListener listener)
Create SpeechEvalatorImpl object, singleton. Called by SpeechEvaluater class method of crateEvaluter(Context, String). Note : must call this method before getEvaluator(), otherwise null point runtime exception will happen.

参数：
context -
params -
返回：
the singleton object of SpeechEvaluaterImpl

getEvaluater

public static SpeechEvaluater getEvaluater()
Get the singleton object of SpeechEvaluaterImpl. Note : must call this method after successful create the singleton object of SpeechEvaluaterImpl, otherwise null point runtime exception will happen.

返回：
the singleton object of SpeechEvaluaterImpl.

isEvaluating

public boolean isEvaluating()
Stops listening for speech.

startEvaluating

public void startEvaluating(com.iflytek.cloud.EvaluaterListener listener,
                            java.lang.String textParams,
                            java.lang.String userModelId,
                            java.lang.String answer)
Use this interface to start session with MSC service. User must set parameter of ent to en or cn. Right now userModelId is no used.

参数：
listener -
engineType -
engineParam -
grammarId -
answer -
